text: Iranian actress) meeting Iranian leader Parvaneh Massoumi (born 1944) is an Iranian actress. She has won the Crystal Simorgh Award for Best Actress two times, for her roles in Siamak Shayeghi's Dowry For Rabab and in Rasul Sadremali's Chrysanthemum Flowers.IMDb ==References== category:Iranian actors
title: Parvaneh Massoumi
